data.title: Broadway Centre Cinemas
data.text:
Our Broadway screenings cost $12 admission. It will cost $10 for film screenings before 5 pm.

The best way to purchase tickets is online ahead of time at www.slfstix.org! If you prefer to purchase tickets on-site, you can use our onsite self-serve kiosk or someone can help you at the concessions counter with a card or cash.

To receive a ticket to a screening at Salt Lake Film Society (“SLFS”) Broadway Centre Cinemas, please visit our website at www.slfstix.org and follow all ticketing prompts to the screening event of your choice.

Parking for Broadway is available in the parking garage just East of the Broadway Centre Cinemas on the other side of the Copper Onion restaurant. Bring your ticket in with you to your movie and we have a validation stamp good for 4 hours.
